If you continue having trouble accessing your account,

                            associates will be happy to assist you.

rewardPoints.jcpCardPurchaseDescription: For each $1 spent on a qualifying purchase at JCPenney stores or jcp.com, you will receive 1 JCPenney Rewards point up to the Point Maximum if the purchase is made with a JCPenney credit card.
rewardPoints.relaunchJcpCardPurchaseDescription: For each $1 spent on a qualifying purchase at JCPenney stores or jcp.com, you will receive 1.5 JCPenney CashPass Points up to the Point Maximum if the purchase is made with a JCPenney credit card.
rewardPoints.relaunchJcpCardPointReceive: If you use a different payment method, you will receive 1 point for every $1 spent on a qualifying purchase.
rewardPoints.jcpCardPointReceive: If you use a different payment method, you will receive 1 point for every $2 spent on a qualifying purchase.
rewardPoints.relaunchJcpCashPointCertificate: Once you reach 200 points, you will be issued a $10 JCPenney CashPass Reward.
rewardPoints.jcpCardCashPointCertificate: Once you reach 200 points, you will be issued a $10 JCPenney Rewards certificate.
rewardPoints.pointsMaximumHeadingDesc: The maximum number of points that you can receive for a single purchase transaction is 2,000 points.
rewardPoints.rewardPointsIconRelaunchText: Earn 1.5 points for every $1 spent with your JCPenney Credit Card or $5 spent at any other merchant with your JCPenney Mastercard. Earn 1 point for every $1 spent with any other method of payment.
rewardPoints.rewardPointsIconText: Earn a point for every $1 spent with your JCPenney Credit Card, every $2 spent with any other method of payment, and every $5 spent at other merchants with your JCPenney Mastercard.
